   The man replied, "But I don't have a   _  , neither an email."

   The man left with   _  . He didn't know what to do, with only $10 in his   _  . He then decided to go to the   _   and buy a basket of tomatoes. He then sold the tomatoes in a door-to-door round. In less than two hours, he   _   to double his capital. He repeated the operation three times, and returned home with $60.
   The man realized that the can   _   in this way, so he started to go   earlier   everyday, and returned later. Thus, his   _   increased with years. Soon, he bought a cart  , then a   _  . He had his own fleet of delivery vehicles 5 years later. Now the man is one of the biggest   _   retailers   in the U.S., selling vegetables and fruit.
   He started to plan his family's future and   _   to have a life insurance. He called an insurance broker  , and chose a protection plan. When the conversation was   _  , the broker asked him for his email. The man replied: "I don't have an email."

   The man thought for a while, and replied: "An office boy at Microsoft!"
